title: _DXGKDT_OPM_DVI_CHARACTERISTICS (d3dkmdt.h)
description: The DXGKDT_OPM_DVI_CHARACTERISTICS enumeration indicates the Digital Video Interface (DVI) electrical characteristics of a connector.
